CREATE ({name:0})
CREATE ({name:1})
MATCH (v1{name:0}) MATCH (v2{name:1}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:1}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:0}) MATCH (v2{name:1}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-6}]->(v2)


MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:1}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH (v1{name:0}) MATCH (v2{name:1}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:4}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:1}) MATCH (v2{name:2}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:1}) MATCH (v2{name:2}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-3}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:2}) MATCH (v2{name:3}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:2}) MATCH (v2{name:3}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:2}]->(v2)


MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:3}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:4}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH (v1{name:4}) MATCH (v2{name:5}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:3}]->(v2)


MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:5}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:6}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:7}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:8}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:8}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:9}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:9}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p

	WHERE sum=0

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:11}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:13}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:14}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p

	WHERE sum=0

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:15}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:16}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:17}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:17}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:19}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:19}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:20}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p

	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:21}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:21}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:21}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p

	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:23}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:23}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:23}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:24}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p

	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:24}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:25}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:25}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:25}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:25}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p

CREATE ({name:25})
MATCH (v1{name:0}) MATCH (v2{name:1}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:1}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:0}) MATCH (v2{name:1}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:2}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:1}) MATCH (v2{name:2}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:1}) MATCH (v2{name:2}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:2}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:2}) MATCH (v2{name:3}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:2}) MATCH (v2{name:3}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-9}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:3}) MATCH (v2{name:4}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:3}) MATCH (v2{name:4}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:1}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:4}) MATCH (v2{name:5}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:4}) MATCH (v2{name:5}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-4}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:5}) MATCH (v2{name:6}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:5}) MATCH (v2{name:6}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:5}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:6}) MATCH (v2{name:7}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:6}) MATCH (v2{name:7}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:3}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:7}) MATCH (v2{name:8}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:7}) MATCH (v2{name:8}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:7}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:8}) MATCH (v2{name:9}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:8}) MATCH (v2{name:9}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:4}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:9}) MATCH (v2{name:10}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:9}) MATCH (v2{name:10}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-7}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:10}) MATCH (v2{name:11}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:10}) MATCH (v2{name:11}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:7}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:11}) MATCH (v2{name:12}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:11}) MATCH (v2{name:12}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:4}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:12}) MATCH (v2{name:13}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:12}) MATCH (v2{name:13}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:13}) MATCH (v2{name:14}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:13}) MATCH (v2{name:14}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:8}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:14}) MATCH (v2{name:15}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:14}) MATCH (v2{name:15}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:6}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:15}) MATCH (v2{name:16}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:15}) MATCH (v2{name:16}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:5}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:16}) MATCH (v2{name:17}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:16}) MATCH (v2{name:17}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-3}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:17}) MATCH (v2{name:18}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:17}) MATCH (v2{name:18}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-9}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:18}) MATCH (v2{name:19}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:18}) MATCH (v2{name:19}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:5}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:19}) MATCH (v2{name:20}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:19}) MATCH (v2{name:20}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-1}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:20}) MATCH (v2{name:21}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:20}) MATCH (v2{name:21}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-9}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:21}) MATCH (v2{name:22}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:21}) MATCH (v2{name:22}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:22}) MATCH (v2{name:23}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:22}) MATCH (v2{name:23}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:2}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:23}) MATCH (v2{name:24}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:23}) MATCH (v2{name:24}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:-3}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:24}) MATCH (v2{name:25}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:0}]->(v2)
MATCH (v1{name:24}) MATCH (v2{name:25}) CREATE (v1)-[:Edge {value:3}]->(v2)


MATCH p = allShortestPaths(({name:0})-[:Edge*]->({name:25}))
	WITH [r in relationships(p) | r.value] as values, p
	WITH reduce(sum=0, v in values | sum+v) as sum, p
	WHERE sum=0
	RETURN p
------
